body.name: 8-Inch Pink Nonstick Egg Pan, PFOA-Free Stone Cookware Skillet, Induction Compatible
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Ultra Nonstick Coating】Innerwell eye-catching pink speckled textured granite nonstick coating, Toxin-free, Without containing any harmful substances such as PFOA, PFOS, PTFE, CHROMIUM, etc. Ideal for cooking with less oil and delivering the ultimate food release.

【Woodgrain Bakelite Handle】Lightweight frying panhandles are designed with the best ergonomic contours, Keep cool wood grain bakelite handles that are double riveted strongly fixed to the pan, that will remain loosen-free for a lifetime.

【Very Easy To Clean】The unique non-stick design inside the skillet requires only a simple wipe with a paper towel or rinse with water, So you don't need to spend a lot of time cleaning while getting perfect cooking results, Ultra-convenient everyday use and clean!

【High Magnetic Conductive Base】Frying pan made of superior aluminum three-layer thick composite bottom construction heats quickly and offers maximal durability, While its never warp base rapidly distributes heat evenly ensuring perfect results every meal.

【Suitable for Various Stoves】Frying pan works perfectly on all types of stovetops, including induction, gas, halogen, electric and ceramic stovetop, etc heat sources, Making cooking easy and convenient, Perfect helper to your kitchen!

【Multifunctional Frying Pan】The professional multi-functional frying pan is suitable for every occasion. you can easily prepare your family's favorite fish, noodles, beef, chicken, and so much more. by frying and cooking them to meet all your family's daily cooking needs!
【Dishwasher Safe】Dishwasher safe, but hand washing recommended.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Gas Stovetop Compatible, Electric Stovetop Compatible, Induction Stovetop Compatible

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value:
Learn how to best use and care for your cookware to last a lifetime!

HOW TO TAKE CARE OF FRUITEAM NONSTICK FRY PANS?

1. A little oil/butter required during cooking, to prolong the lifespan of non-stick coating,avoid cooking sprays.

2. Don 't leave an empty pan on a hot burner or allow it to boil dry. Always use low-medium heat, Overheating will lessen the life of non-stick coating.

,

3. Let the pan cool before washing. Then, you only need to wash it with hot soapy water and dry it completely with a soft cotton or linen towel.

4. Cookware is dishwasher safe, But the pans are not recommended to be cleaned by dishwasher, which may damage its nonstick coatings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Innerwell a well-engineered tri-ply nonstick fry pan flawless function, meet all your needs: 1. Eye-catching elegantly pink premium speckled textured granite nonstick coating 2. Lightweight, non-slip skillet handles 3. Superior aluminum triple-thick composite bottom 4. All types of stovetops 5. Vary easy cleanup 6. Excellent heat distribution and handling 7. Oven safe up to 150°c 8. Dishwasher safe (but hand washing recommended). Safe and heath nonstick coating without including potentially toxic materials like PFOA, PTFE, other PFOS, lead, cadmium, or toxic metals. Ideal for cooking fluffy omelets, Whisper-thin crepes, and delicate fish fillets—cooking any kind of food at your will without the risk of your food sticking to the bottom. Make cooking delicate foods like eggs and fish easier. our sleek, Clean design would complement any kitchen collection for you to enjoy every cooking moment & a healthier lifestyle.

Exquisite Gift Package Box Set 3-piece nonstick frying pan exquisite gift package box set makes a great gift, that perfect gift for your friends and family, especially to those who are food lovers. It will be the best gift, whether it’s a housewarming gift, wedding gift and showers gift or Christmas, thanksgiving, father’s day, mother’s day, holiday gift. Pink Natural Stone Granite-Style Coating Ever 100% non-toxic, free of PTFE PFOA, PFOS, lead and cadmium.With minimum oil or butter for healthy diet.Better food release, no chipping, no peeling or no flaking. Versatility and the ease of use Adopts german technology, Improves adherence, reinforces durabilityVibrant finishes, eye-catching beauty and charmSuperior nonstick performance, long-life non-stickDurability, scratch-resistant, corrosion-resistant, rust and abrasion resistant

Super easy to clean Easy wipe to cleanSpend less time with cleanupWater-saving, effortless cooking and quick cleanupDishwasher safe but we recommend handwashing Ergonomic Woodgrain Bakelite Handle comfortable and lightweight, beautiful and practicalwall-mounted design for easy hanging storageeasy to hold, which is safe and reliablelong handles designed, heat escapeanti-slip, anti-scald and heat-resistance, stays cool when cooking Aluminum core base Fast & even heat Sturdy construction made from recycled aluminumMagnetized base, warp-resistanceExcellent even heat transferQuick, even heat distributionEven heat base,no hot spots

Installation manual of frying pan 1. with the gifted scre wdriver, remove the scre w 2. adjust the protection circle to the right position at the handle 3. riveted handle need to installed/tightened on the pan body by scre wdriver firm and anti-shake 4. installation is complete with easy and convenient learn how to use and care for your cookware to last a lifetime! skillet set care and use guide 1. when using it, you only need to use the medium to small fire to cook delicious food. when you use high fire, there must be food or water in the pan. 2. don't leave an empty pan on a hot burner or allow it to boil dry. always use low-medium heat, overheating will lessen the life of the non-stick coating. 3. a little oil/butter is required during cooking, to prolong the lifespan of non-stick coating, avoid cooking sprays. 4. recommend using heat-resistant nylon, silicone or wooden utensils to use when you cook, to help prevent scratches. please avoid using a sharp spatula or metal utensils. 5. let the pan cool before washing. then, you need to wash by hand with warm water and mild detergent and dry it completely with a soft cotton or linen towel, please do not use a rough emery cloth vigorously to clean it. 6. cookware is dishwasher safe, but the pans are not recommended to be cleaned by dishwasher, which may damage its nonstick coatings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use. Easy Clean Up.
reviews.reviewText: We love this mini nonstick pan, it is perfect for making small omelets and a quick saute for a small meal. Visually appealing and worth the purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size, great quality
reviews.reviewText: It really is non-stick. I'm only cook for myself so the size is perfect for a single serving. The color is nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The non stick pans are great, I really love them! This is a great purchase, I always keep it on the stove and the pink pan looks beautiful. I usually like to make omelets or eggs for my family in the morning and this pan is perfect, the heat is distributed very evenly on the bottom, non-stick and easy to clean up. I wiped it off with a soft sponge or rag after cooking and it didn't stick. When I first got my frying pans, I was worried that it wouldn't be easy to assemble. But it was easy to assemble following the instructions step in the manual. You can be assured. The handle is definitely long enough to keep your hands out of the danger zone, the texture is smooth for a comfortable grip, and it has a wood grain to prevent burns.Overall, I absolutely love this pan set. buy it. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good nonstick pan
reviews.reviewText: This works great as a non stick pan and the pink is cute. So far no issues with scratching. Removing one star because the screw attaching the handle to the pan occasionally loosens and need to be retightened.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Use this as our egg skillet no sticking if the eggs, easy fast clean up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this pink frying pan for several months now (twice a day, every day ), and it has performed great and kept its beautiful pink color. So glad I bought it, and thinking of buyin another just in case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No lid and you have to put the handle on. Was disappointment. It’s my fault that I didn’t realize it didn’t have a lid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap pan, but cute and works
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute and functional pan, but it breaks down quickly. Do not put it in a dishwasher

Llegó el sartén en perfectas condiciones en su caja , me agrado la textura y calidad del sartén . Llegó con un desarmador para armarlo que detalle del vendedor realmente quede satisfecho lo recomiendo

Le pentole arrivano in una scatola bella solida. All’interno c’è tutto quello che serve per assemblare i manici, le maniglie ed i coperchi (si tratta di 2 minuti e, si, vi danno anche il cacciavite). Il colore è spettacolare, molto più vivace di quel che mi aspettassi.

Le lot de casseroles rose est juste canon et très utiles, elles ne collent pas.J'ai eu un léger soucis avec l'une d'elle mais le service client a été vraiment top, merci encore :)Je vous les recommande fortement

Ich war erst etwas skeptisch. Der Preis erschien mir recht hoch... für so eine kleine Pfanne, aber das Produkt ist Top. Das Oberflächenmaterial der Pfanne Robust, gutes Händling und nicht besonderst kratzempfindlich. Der Griff besteht aus einem sehr angenehmen weichen, gut in der handliegendem, Material. Zu dem sieht sie auch einfach echt Gut aus. Sie wurde in einem Katon mit Griff zur Selbstmontage geliefert. Es war tatsächlich sogar ein guter Schraubenzieher dabei und die Monage war einfach. Auserdem gab es noch zwei Ersatzschrauben dazu. Alles in allem ein guter Kauf. Meine Tochter hat sich zu Weihnachten sehr darüber gefreut.

El sartén no llega armado, es un poco difícil ponerle el mango. La calidad es buena y no se le pega absolutamente nada. El color y tamaño de la descripción es el mismo del sartén y se ve muy tierno en color rosa. Además, funciona con casi nada de aceite.
